name: Enchanted in the Moonlight: Miyabi, Kyoga & Samon
storyline:
You live a normal life, until the day you’re attacked by otherworldly Ayakashi, who are intent on stealing the special power you were born with. However, your saviors also happen to be Ayakashi, and five very handsome ones at that!

You were born with the ability to amplify the power of any Ayakashi. In order to save your life, your Ayakashi marks you with his kiss; and how exactly do you transfer your power to him? Why, also with a kiss, of course!
summary: You’re an average 25-year-old girl, working at the library to make ends meet and support your family’s shrine. However, that all changes when handsome men save you from malevolent spirits! It turns out, though, your saviors are more than they appear… They’re Ayakashi Spirits, too.
